name: Laharl
description:
An arrogant Overlord who is always trying to prove he is the strongest demon in the Netherworld.
He may look a little frail, but don't underestimate him.
This diminutive demon is capable of exceeding 530K Power.
He doesn't wash his hands after going to the toilet.
He plays 100 hours of video games each day.
He takes whatever he wants.
And that's not all. As the ruler of the Netherworld, he is the epitome of evil.
â€» Good kids should stay away!

name: Killia
description:
After Void Dark killed his lover, he became a loner filled with hatred 
whose only goal was to seek revenge.
However, an encounter with real friendship 
changed him.
He is Goldion's favorite student and the successor to the 
Ultimate Demon Techniques.
To everyone's surprise, he became a fighter who also has a great love for cooking.
His specialty is curry.
He has a naughty side and 
sometimes likes to eat during battle.

name: Valvatorez
description:
Valvatorez is a 
Prinny Instructor in Hades, the Nether Prison.
He was once a powerful demon who was feared as 
a Tyrant and a vampire.
Eventually, he made a promise 
to never drink human blood again.
Now that he can't drink blood, sardines are his favorite food.
He believes sardines help him regain some of the power he can no longer get from drinking blood.

name: Adell
description:
Adell is a very honest, passionate boy 
who always does whatever he knows to be right.
He never breaks a promise, because 
it is not his style.
Due to a previous psychological trauma, he has a deep fear of women. 
Luckily, Rozalin has helped 
him make progress in this regard.
Family means a lot to him. 
However, it seems he is 
too shy to ask Rozalin to 
marry him...

name: Mao
description:
Mao is a genius with an Evil Quotient of 1.8 million.
He is both the Dean of the Evil Academy and the No.1 Freshman Leader. Although Raspberyl is Mao's archrival, they actually maintain a close relationship.
He loves human experimentation and body modification.
Whenever he discovers something to experiment on, he starts breathing heavily and making strange noises. Not soon after, he also starts to drool.

name: Etna
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Fallen Angel Flonne
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Seraphina
description:
Seraphina is the Gorgeous Overlord. 
She is the wealthiest being in the Netherworld, Celestia and the Human World.
She is extremely beautiful and her 
"Balor Gaze" 
can make any male become her slave.
She met Killia 
while fighting Void Dark and quickly fell in love with him.
She is always thinking of ways to charm Killia in order 
to make him her minion.

name: Fuka Kazamatsuri
description:
Fuka is a student 
at St. Goliath 3-B.
After she was killed, she was supposed to become a Prinny, but there weren't enough Prinny hides, so she remained a human.
She won't admit to having died and stubbornly believes that everything around her is a dream.
The average person 
can only release 30% of their potential%, but her Power of Belief enables her to reach her full 100%.

name: Rozalin
description:
Rozalin is Overlord Zenon's only daughter. She has lived most of her life in a massive mansion and thus, grew up unaware of the world's suffering.
However, her true identity is... (TBC)
She has spent a lot of time with Adell, from whom she's constantly trying to get away. 
She has totally not in any way fallen in love with him at all.
This romantic comedy has gone on for quite some time. 
After the two completed their own adventure, they returned home  together and are basically a couple.
She was born to the Snow clan, and is very haughty.

name: Axel
description:
Axel was once a famous demon known by many as the Dark Hero.
However, his popularity has waned over the years and he is somewhat of a has-been.
This happens to many famous entertainers. Axel is rather 
sad he can't go back to his former glory days.
Until this day, he has ignored the cold eyes of others. One day, he will return to the stage and reign as the king of rock forever.

name: Fenrich
description:
Fenrich is a werewolf and 
Valvatorez's butler.
He once was hired 
to assassinate Valvatorez, but failed because he was impressed by Valvatorez's magnanimous appeal.
He then vowed to remain loyal to his new master until the day he died.
As a ruthless strategist, he will do whatever he can to help Valvatorez 
be seen as the strongest Demon in the Netherworld.

name: Majorita
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Emizel
description:
Emizel, son of the Death King, followed in his father's footsteps and became the 
63rd President of the Netherworld.
He once was the leader of 
the president's elite task force, as well as an enemy of Valvatorez and Fenrich, but 
now they are good friends.

name: Barbara
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Girl Laharl
description:
Laharl once accidentally turned into a girl.
Although he looked different, it was still the same old Laharl inside.
"C'mon, this is ridiculous!"
Apparently, some of Laharl's diehard fans were less than happy with this plot development.

name: Christo
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Zeroken
description:
Zeroken is known as the man who revived the Ultimate Demon Techniques.
In the past, he was a 
timid teenager who worshiped Goldion, but eventually he became an Overlord who fights for those he cherishes.
All modern martial art techniques in the Netherworld 
are branches of the Ultimate Demon Techniques, bearing witness to his extraordinary achievements.

name: Red Magnus
description:
Red Magnus is the Overlord of the Scorching Flame.
He is a natural super-fighter who believes power is everything.
His own underlings once betrayed him 
because they thought he was too capricious.
He became a much calmer individual after meeting Killia.
Magnus once made 
Killia his eternal rival, but the two are still on good terms.

name: King Krichevskoy
description:
King Krichevskoy is Laharl's dad and 
an ally of Lamington, the High Seraph of Celestia.
He is regarded as a great Netherworld ruler. 
No one has ever matched his strength and personality. 
He is loved by many.
He is also the only demon Etna admires.

name: Sicily
description:
Sicily is an Angel who came from Celestia to become an Overlord.
She claims she is King Krichevskoy's daughter and 
Laharl's sister.
"She is both an angel and the daughter of a demon? 
What's the deal!?"
Any players who are wondering what the answer to this question is, please play 
DISGAEA D2.

name: Almaz
description:
One day, a timid hero 
came to the Evil Academy. 
He encountered various incidents in the Netherworld 
after meeting Mao. 
After going through all that, he grew a lot and eventually 
blossomed into a true hero! 
He is now living a sweet married life 
with Princess Sapphire.

name: Master Big Star
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Salvatore
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Sapphire
description:
She is a princess in the Human World.
She may appear as a delicate princess, but is actually a fierce warrior who vowed 
to defeat the Overlord before the Overlord 
had a chance to kidnap her! 
She is also a born killing machine 
that annihilates any demon on sight! 
She calls herself a "somewhat robust princess".

name: Nemo
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Bloodis
description:
A Demon General who's been called 
the right-hand man of Void Dark the Demon Emperor. 
It is rumored that he is by far the most powerful Demon General, and his overwhelming fighting ability 
is second only to Void Dark. 	
Loyal to Void Dark, the black-armored Demon General 
continues to carry out his duties today 
in a chilly manner.

name: Nagi
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Rutile
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Stella
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Xenolith
description:
Xenolith is a mysterious and reserved red-haired Demon.
He has awesome magic abilities and 
is believed to be as strong as an Overlord.
He has spent a lot of time trying to protect 
his sister, Etna. 
Don't ever try talking to him.

name: Apprentice Angel Flonne
description:
Flonne was once sent from 
Celestia by Lamington 
to assassinate King Krichevskoy.
However, shortly after her arrival, she was caught by Laharl and Etna. 
After a series of events, they then became partners.
She is obsessed with the concept of "love".
She is frequently called a "Love Freak" 
due to how she never stops talking about it.

name: Pure Flonne
description:
This is Flonne's form that looks like Pure Pink from the 
Pure Seven Morphing Angels TV show.
When she looks like this, she possesses Archangel powers.
Why? Because of love!
There is no problem that the 
power of love can't resolve!

name: Archangel Flonne
description:
After Vulcanus died (erm... huh?), Flonne was made into a temporary Archangel!
This promotion 
shocked everyone in Celestia. 
Everyone wondered what Lamington's intentions were.
Please take a look at 
the final EP of Archangel Flonne: The Way of the Archangel!

name: Void Dark
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Angel Artina
description:
In the Human World, Artina was a nurse and a nun. 
When she died, she became an Angel and spent her time 
stealing money from Demons. This earned her the title 
"Angel of Avarice".
On the battlefield, she will try to save everyone, even if they're an enemy.
It is because of Artina that the 
powerful Vampire Tyrant Valvatorez 
gave up 
drinking human blood.

name: Nurse Artina
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Tyrant Valvatorez
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Tyrant Overlord Killidia
description:
Killidia is the Overlord of the Cryo Blood Netherworld.
He was once tyrannical and invincible, but Goldion cut him down to size.
After spending time with Goldion and his daughter Liezerota, the coldness in his heart eventually melted.
However, this encounter led to a greater tragedy.....

name: Awakened Killia
description:
Awakened Killia is 
Tyrant Overlord Killidia's form after his cold heart thawed.
Once his evil heart 
was cleansed of all 
anger, hatred, and sorrow, Killia obtained real power and 
mastered the ultimate skill of 
the Ultimate Demon Techniques!!

name: Etna [Color Versions]
description:
These are Etna's clones.
Each clone is 
as strong as Etna, so don't think 
they will be defeated easily.
It's easy to see 
how much enthusiasm the developers have for this version!
Perhaps one day, DISGAEA 
will also be a fighting game....

name: Skirt Version Etna (Majin Etna)
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Asagi
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Captain Gordon, Defender of Earth
description:
Gordon is the 37th Defender of Earth.
He first met Laharl 
when the Earth Defense Force 
sent him to the Netherworld to wipe out the Overlord.
He is seen by many as a bumbling and incompetent buffoon.
Nevertheless, he 
never fails to save the day.
He likes to eat Pizza Shack's 
Teriyaki Pizza.

name: Jennifer
description:
Jennifer is Captain Gordon's blonde assistant.
Without knowing her, Jennifer may just seem like eye candy, but she is in fact a 
super talented genius 
who developed an invincible robot when she was 5 and got a 
doctorate when she was 10.
Some say she is also really good at martial arts.

name: Mr. Champloo
description:
Champloo is a Home Economics teacher at the Evil Academy and a master of High Heat-Style Chaos-School Kitchen Fist.
"Cooking comes from the heart!
Cooking means always risking your life! You  must be passionate about cooking and use the right ingredients. Boom!"
This is his personal philosophy.

name: Yukimaru
description:
Like Rozalin, Yukimaru was born to the Snow Clan.
Yukimaru first met 
Rozalin and Adell when she was searching for Zenon to avenge the destruction of her village.
She is a powerful ninja, but her sense of responsibility
often gets her in 
difficult situations.
A young ninja.

name: Fubuki
description:
Yukimaru's older brother.
Fubuki is a dangerous ninja. 
To avenge his clan, he is willing to do anything and 
once fought against Adell.
In a previous battle, he lost his eyesight. 
However, with his determined nature, he has been able to keep 
improving his ninjutsu.
His voice actor is Takehito Koyasu, who himself is a 
big fan of DISGAEA.

name: Zenon
description:
As the God of All Overlords, he is greatly feared and 
many Overlords want to kill him.
He is the Overlord of Overlords.
It is 
extremely difficult
to determine how strong this individual is.
However, he chose to be 
reincarnated after getting tired of fighting and killing.
After reincarnation, he became Rozalin.

name: Justice Flonne
description:
Fallen Angel Flonne 
liked Prism Rangers too much 
and turned into Justice Flonne.
In this form, she doesn't seem too different from her Apprentice Angel form. 
"I can feel myself
getting stronger and more courageous!"
She can already say things like this.

name: Kurtis
description:
The appearance of Kurtis during his lifetime.
He lost 70% of his body 
in an "incident", and is now 
mostly a mechanized cyborg.
Although he and Gordon have 
had their clashes, they are now 
comrades in arms. 
With hot blood wrapped in a steel body, he's determined to eliminate all evil!

name: Don Joaquin
description:
The first Defender of Earth who is said 
to have left for the Netherworld 
to defeat the Overlord but never returned. 
He became a ghost in the Netherworld 
and stood in the way of Laharl, but eventually he fulfilled his long-time wish as a Hero 
and passed away. 
Now, he has emerged as the heroic spirit 
of the Defender of Earth!
He targets the Overlord but has many demon friends, and he is kind to everyone 
except the Overlord. 
He may look like an ordinary old man, but his hidden power is the real deal!

name: Christo
description:
He says he is an Overlord from what he claims is a "certain giant Netherworld".
He is an extremely skilled and ruthless war strategist and will do anything to win a battle.
Somehow, he knows a lot about Celestia. 
In order to help those in the Netherworld understand what Christmas is, he has been preparing gifts for everyone.
But he becomes very worried as things go wrong.

name: Mage Noel
description:
Noel has been greatly influenced by the books she has read about the ways of the Human World. 
She really loves Santa.
To her, it truly is amazing that Santa is able to deliver gifts to people all over the world in one night.
However, she has developed a crazy belief that Santa became a superhuman by delivering gifts and that she can also become a more powerful wizard by imitating him.
With Christmas approaching in the Netherworld, she thinks its a good idea to help Christo so she can learn the secrets of Santa.

name: Majorita
description:
On the hunt for Christmas gifts, this former Demon General appeared before Laharl and the others.
Majorita eventually cast a 
curse on herself that would resurrect her.
Although she looks quite cute, she is not at all weak.
Why does Majorita 
want a gift.....

name: Prinny Kurtis
description:
As a human, Kurtis sacrificed himself in a battle 
and ended up as a green Prinny. 
Even as a Prinny, he is still a Defender of Earth.
His heroic character 
has gained the admiration of many Prinnies, who all call him 
"Green Bro!"
He has worked hard to copy the way 
Prinnies speak by saying "dood" at the end of every sentence in order to get along with them.
He still feels trapped in his new Prinny body and is 
working on a way to become human again.

name: Dark Adonis Mid-Boss
description:
A narcissistic demon
who sees Laharl as a rival 
and is always up for a fight.
Don't judge him on his name. 
When he met Laharl the first time, he exclaimed:
"Just call me Mid-Boss!"
Ever since that encounter, 
this name has stuck to him. 
He hasn't been able to change this situation either.
After receiving Laharl's invite to 
decide who the strongest Demon is, he decides to go, but what is his true intention...?

name: Rainier
description:
Born to a family of treasure hunters, she has a knack for hunting treasure. 
She did not recognize Laharl's status as an Overlord at first, but now she seems to have accepted it. Maybe. 
She claims to have babysat Laharl when he was a child and that Laharl loved to act like a spoiled baby. The accuracy of this claim seems to be a matter of fierce debate.

name: Kyoko Needleworker
description:
One of Raspberyl's lackeys 
who enjoys needlework. 
She is well versed in the legends of the academy 
and can play the role of commentator without a hitch. 
With her ninja-level stealth, she has been spreading rumors 
about the legendary graduate Raspberyl 
without the students realizing it. 
She's always working 
with Asuka Cranekick, another lackey of Raspberyl, and they spend their days 
praising Raspberyl together.

name: Asuka Cranekick
description:
Another of Raspberyl's lackeys who likes to 
send Paper Cranes to opponents after beating them up. 
She is a quiet, naturally polite young lady. 
She looks like she keeps a memoir 
of the legendary delinquency 
of Raspberyl 
and reads it to the students. 
Because of her blind faith in Raspberyl, she shows no mercy towards anyone 
who harbors ill will toward her 
and will dispatch them on sight. 
Dispatch to where, you ask? 
Well, you don't really want to know...

name: Saint Etna
description:
A demon that looks just like Etna 
who has suddenly shifted into this world. 
Her soft-spoken manner 
and her white costume 
give the impression of a saint. 
Who is she and 
what is her purpose?

name: Fuka XENO
description:
A girl who came from nowhere 
and looks exactly like Fuka. 
However, she's got different skin color and clothes, as well as a different personality. 
Why she showed up 
in front of Fuka and the others 
remains a mystery. 
XENO is read exactly as it's spelled, thanks for asking.

name: Desco XENO
description:
The ultimate weapon, she looks identical to Desco 
and came here along with Fuka XENO. 
The way she calls 
Fuka XENO "Big Sis" 
with fondness 
resembles Fuka and Desco, but the way she looks at Saint Etna 
with coldness and evil in her eyes 
is nothing like Desco. 
The XENO in her name is read just like the one in her sister's.

name: Love Oracle
description:
A Magic Cutie who claims to have been born in a dandelion.
She's actually a boy who plays a Magic Cutie for fun! 
Love Oracle never gives up.
For himself, and for 
the pride of all Magic Cuties! 
Who the Celestia is Love Oracle? 
Will his true identity 
be revealed one day?

name: Takashi Boy
description:
The true face of Love Oracle the Magic Cutie 
upon losing everything. 
His costume, on which Takashi spent 
a whole month's allowance, has been rent asunder 
by its violent requisition at the hands of Darktina. 
Poor Love Oracle. Keep it together, Takashi.

name: Virunga
description:
Archangel from Celestia. 
He is quite beautiful, unlike a certain evil-looking beard-face (according to Etna). 
A talented person who uses his wisdom and tactics 
to defend order in Celestia, but why is he in the Netherworld, and in a Cat Cafe?

name: Barbara
description:
A demon who was once an Overlord Candidate.
Born into a family of venerable knights, she believes in following her Lord's orders faithfully 
and obeys any command. 
She's called an Order-Taking Demon, and will turn the tables on you 
if your instructions are not specific enough. 
But Barbara never acts through her own will. 
So why is she here in the Cat Cafe?

name: Vato Brothers
description:
Demon Chewie, who includes "ese" at the end of every line he says. 
Demon Cholo, who includes "homes" at the end of every line he says. 
Demon Churro, who includes "weddo" at the end of every line he says. 
The three of them are called Vato Brothers! 
Don't you say we are the same. 
Freshmen of Evil Academy 
and classmates with Mao and Sapphire.

name: Iron-blooded Ayame
description:
She made herself a name among the freshmen 
during Mao the Dean's absence. 
When provoked, she'll subdue her opponents 
with her fists in one-on-one duels 
on the riverbank. 
With her strength, good looks 
and cool temperament, she is very popular 
even among female students. 
The male student uniform is her favorite daily dress.

name: Sister Artina
description:
The appearance of Artina 
when she was alive as a human being. 
During her life, she was an innocent and virtuous nun 
who healed the wounded of war 
and saved the lives of many soldiers, both allies and enemies. 
She also has a compassionate heart 
that treats demons kindly 
and without prejudice.

name: Usalia
description:
Usalia is the heiress of the Toto Bunny Netherworld.
Her parents were killed by the Demon General Majorita.
She inherited the throne from her parents and 
continued their mission to create a 
peaceful Netherworld for pacifist Demons.
She loves to eat curry. She rides on a large yellow Prinny.
She can eat curry 
every meal, every day, for 365 days a year.

name: Desco
description:
The ultimate weapon 
created by Genjuro, Fuka Kazamatsuri's father.
Desco's biggest dream is to 
conquer the world with her sister Fuka.
She practices hard every day
to become a Final Boss, and has displayed her potential by fighting other heroes 
and coming back stronger by reincarnation even if she loses.
She can also use 3 Transformations. 
Come on, Desco!
It won't be long until you are the Final Boss!

name: Des X
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Prinny Kurtis
description:
Gordon's rival, the Defender of Earth, "Kurtis". 
Due to a certain incident, he was killed 
and reincarnated as Prinny Kurtis. 
Though he may appear to be a Prinny, he's actually a Defender of Earth. 
Prinny Kurtis has a number of subtle 
yet obvious differences from ordinary Prinnies. 
His color is green, and his eyes are sharp. 
But most important of all, he never uses the word "dood". 
However, when thrown, he still explodes on impact.

name: Pringer X
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Hugo
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Thursday
description:
Thursday is an 
All-Purpose Robot
that was invented by the genius martial artist Jennifer. He is able to understand human emotions, speaks a few basic human words, and mercilessly roasts others.
Despite being invincible, he often malfunctions.
Although his appearance is somewhat retro, he is equipped with the most advanced weapons available.

name: Taro
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Hanako
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Tink
description: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

name: Vulcanus
description:
Although he is an angel, you shouldn't judge him on appearances alone.
After all, he is a former Archangel.
Vulcanus is super arrogant about what he believes in and 
prejudice consumes his entire being.
After he was found out by Seraph Lamington, he was expelled from Celestia. 
No one knows where he went, but...

name: Archangel Lamington
description:
Lamington is the High Seraph of Celestia.
He once allied with King Krichevskoy to 
restore communication 
between 
Celestia and the Netherworld.
Some believe he was quite naughty when he was younger, but he has never said anything about this himself.
No one knows the truth.

name: Ms. Raspberyl
description:
Raspberyl has been considered 
the No.1 Delinquent Student at the Evil Academy since its establishment.
Her escapades have made her a legend.
She is never late to class and always eats up everything on her plate.
She will always say hello to whoever greets her and goes home on time.
She never ceases to amaze the world with her heroic deeds.
She was even able to become one of the first Evil Academy alumni.
After graduating, she became a Delinquent Teacher and used this to further pursue a path of delinquency.

name: Hoggmeiser
description:
Hoggmeiser is 
King Krichevskoy's 
former butler. 
His name says it all. He loves money more than anything else.
After King Krichevskoy died, he 
stole a load of money 
and built his own castle that was eventually destroyed by Laharl.
He has now become 
a vault keeper for the Evil Academy, but he is still corrupt. He's making full use of his talents.

name: Super Hero Aurum
description:
As the strongest hero, Aurum became consumed by power and 
went down the wrong path after being tortured by an empty loneliness. In order to rediscover his value, he concealed his identity and became Mao's butler in the hopes of creating the fiercest Overlord. He should have been 
punished by Mao, right...?

name: Prism Rangers
description:
The Prism Rangers are a group of heroes from a popular TV show.
Although each member is supposed to be named after the colors of the rainbow, some aren't. 
And they don't always have enough characters for an entire rainbow.
Please don't laugh at their flawed design.
Sometimes, the same colored member will have a totally different personality.
It may be because they recruit new members all the time to wear the uniform.

name: Pringer V3
description:
The ingenious Overlord Mao 
once used his 1.8 million EQ 
to combine 3 random Prinnies 
into a Super Alloy Robot.
Its name was Pringer V3!
Few who have faced off against 
Pringer V3 have lived to tell the tale.
